attributes.action: VAT on feminine hygiene products must stop!
attributes.additional_details:
We were not given the choice to be women!  We have to pay VAT due to our sex, this is ridiculous and must end. You hand out free condoms but we have to pay for things we can't help. Pads and tampons ought to be free or they should be available for a small fee not the prices they are right now.
The government must end VAT tax on feminine hygiene products!
